channel.title: Exercises练习 on Python programming
channel.description: Recent content in Exercises练习 on Python programming

item.title: String 1
item.description: Exercise 1 Write a program to calculate the length of a string. For example: string = 'Practice makes perfect' Length of this string is 20 Not allowed to use len() (不允许使用len()函数) Exercise 2 Given a string consists of lower and upper case letters, write a program to convert lower case to upper case and upper case to lower case, return the result. For example: # Input string = 'I hAVe UPPeR caSE AnD lowER CasE LETteRs' # Output result = 'i HavE uppEr CAse aNd LOWer cASe letTErS' Hint: lower() and uppwer() are Python functions to convert upper to lower and vice versa.
